Name: QualitySchemeName
Description: A name for the QualityScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the QualityScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the QualityScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: QualitySchemeReference
Description: Inclusion of an existing QualityScheme by reference.

Name: QualityStatementReference
Description: In-line description of a QualityStatement. These are used by reference at various points in the lifecycle.

Name: QualityStandardReference
Description: In-line description of a QualityStandard. These are used by reference at various points in the lifecycle.

Name: QualityStatementGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of QualityStatements.

Name: QualityStandardGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of QualityStandards.
